meanings.definition: A layer of clothing worn under another garment.
meanings.sent1: She wore cozy subtunics under her winter coat.
meanings.sent2: The subtunics kept him warm during the chilly night.
meanings.sent3: The subtunics peeked out from under her dress, making her look like a fashion guru.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like a comforting subtunics, always there to support her.
meanings.sent5: The subtunics were like a hidden shield, protecting her from the cold.

meanings.definition: A group of cells or tissues located beneath another structure.
meanings.sent1: The subtunics of the plant helped it grow strong roots.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the subtunics of the organ to understand its function better.
meanings.sent3: The subtunics of the building seemed to have a secret life of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the subtunics of a tree, hidden but providing strength.
meanings.sent5: The subtunics of the mountain held the key to its stability.
